Posts.Content: Took Anastrozole for two weeks, got really sick and stopped.  Still having bouts of nausea 6 months later that no one can explain.  Anyone else?
Posts.Title: Anastrozole/nausea

Posts.Content: I have had a hard area behind areola since dye injection for lumpectomy . Has anyone else had this problem? Can't seem to get an answer from doctors. Thanks Angie
Posts.Title: Areola complication from dye
